# OpenClaw Enthusiasts

> Practical automation use cases for OpenClaw â€” the open-source AI agent platform.

This site publishes step-by-step guides showing how to build real-world automations with OpenClaw: from email triage and invoice tracking to server monitoring and video editing pipelines.

## Links

- Website: https://openclaw.mkdox.com/
- Blog: https://openclaw.mkdox.com/blog/
- RSS Feed: https://openclaw.mkdox.com/feed_rss_created.xml
- Full post index for LLMs: https://openclaw.mkdox.com/llms-full.txt
